txt.en: The sheep is feeling better now
Rhosgobel: Calming the Farm
Calm the upset cow
Calm the upset goat

'There are many threats still on the edges of the Vales. I am concerned about the animals on farms of the Beornings and Woodmen. They are restless and could use some reassurance that there are many who will look out for them and care for them.'
Calm the upset chicken
Calm the upset horse
Calm the upset pig
'You have helped a great deal. There are still more animals in the Vales who will need our assistance soon enough.'
Calm the upset sheep
The cat is feeling better now
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should talk to Radagast.
Many farm animals in the Vales of Anduin are upset and could use kind and calming hand.
Upset animals can be found throughout the Vales of Anduin.\n\nYou should calm upset animals.
